Detailed Description

A rule for torsional conformer searching, defined by a SMARTS pattern.

Rules define a SMARTS pattern to match and a set of 4 reference atoms defining the dihedral angle. The rule can either define a set of possible dihedral angles in degrees or a "delta" (i.e., all multiples of delta will be considered)
